classification.description: An identifier of the data format that the classifier matches.

rowTag.description: The XML tag designating the element that contains each record in an XML document being parsed. Note that this cannot identify a self-closing element (closed by `/>`). An empty row element that contains only attributes can be parsed as long as it ends with a closing tag (for example, `<row item_a="A" item_b="B"></row>` is okay, but `<row item_a="A" item_b="B" />` is not).
